title: The Republic of South Africa: the land and its people - Rev. ed.
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Clifford J. Kamen
brief_description: Compares three ways of life in the Republic of South Africa: tribal life, white farmers and mining communities. Shows how the culture patterns of each region are influenced by the topography climate, and resources of the region.
